Package com.azure.spring.messaging.implementation.config

Class AbstractAzureListenerEndpoint

java.lang.Object
com.azure.spring.messaging.implementation.config.AbstractAzureListenerEndpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
AzureListenerEndpoint
Direct Known Subclasses:
MethodEventHubsListenerEndpoint, MethodServiceBusListenerEndpoint
public abstract class AbstractAzureListenerEndpoint extends Object implements AzureListenerEndpoint
Base model for a Azure listener endpoint.

  • Method Details

    • setupListenerContainer

      public void setupListenerContainer(MessageListenerContainer listenerContainer, AzureMessageConverter<?,?> converter)
      Description copied from interface: AzureListenerEndpoint
      Set up the specified message listener container with the model defined by this endpoint.

      This endpoint must provide the requested missing option(s) of the specified container to make it usable. Usually, this is about setting the destination and the messageListener to use but an implementation may override any default setting that was already set.

      Specified by:
      setupListenerContainer in interface AzureListenerEndpoint
      Parameters:
      listenerContainer - the listener container to configure
      converter - the message converter to configure

    • createMessageListener

      protected abstract MessagingMessageListenerAdapter createMessageListener(MessageListenerContainer listenerContainer, @Nullable AzureMessageConverter<?,?> messageConverter)
      Create a MessagingMessageListenerAdapter that is able to serve this endpoint for the specified container.
      Parameters:
      listenerContainer - the message listener container
      messageConverter - the message converter
      Returns:
      AzureMessageHandler
